sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import jsPDF from "jspdf" import "jspdf-autotable" const Invoices = () => { const [batchSlips, setBatchSlips] = useState([]) const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false) const [modalContent, setModalContent] = useState(null) const [modalType, setModalType] = useState("") // 'invoice' or 'batchslip' useEffect(() => { // Load batch slips from localStorage const savedBatchSlips = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("batchSlips") || "[]") setBatchSlips(savedBatchSlips) }, []) const generateInvoicePDF = (invoice) => { const doc = new jsPDF() // Header doc.setFontSize(16) doc.setFont(undefined, "bold") doc.text("RR CONSTRUCTIONS", 20, 20) doc.text("Tax Invoice", 150, 20) doc.setFontSize(10) doc.setFont(undefined, "normal") doc.text("GSTIN: 33AAGFT4474P1Z1", 20, 30) doc.text(`Invoice No: ${invoice.invoiceNumber}`, 150, 30) doc.text("Excel College Campus, NH 91, Mathura", 20, 35) doc.text(`Date: ${new Date(invoice.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}`, 150, 35) doc.text("Road, Haryana - 121102", 20, 40) doc.text(`Batch Number: ${invoice.batchNumber}`, 150, 40) doc.text("GST/NSN: 33AAGFT4474P1Z1", 20, 45) doc.text("Terms of Delivery: As per Order &", 150, 45) doc.text("Biller: INFRA LP", 20, 50) doc.text("Cheque", 150, 50) doc.text("State Name: Tamil Nadu, India", 20, 55) // Bill To section doc.setFont(undefined, "bold") doc.text("Bill To:", 20, 70) doc.text("Dispatch Site:", 150, 70) doc.setFont(undefined, "normal") doc.text(invoice.clientName, 20, 80) doc.text("N/A", 150, 80) doc.text(invoice.clientAddress, 20, 85) doc.text("Bill of Lading/Ref No: N/A", 150, 85) doc.text(`GSTIN: ${invoice.clientGSTIN || "N/A"}`, 20, 90) // Table const tableData = [ [invoice.description, invoice.hsn, invoice.quantity, `₹${invoice.rate}`, invoice.unit, `₹${invoice.total}`], ] doc.autoTable({ startY: 100, head: [["Description", "HSN", "Quantity", "Rate", "Per", "Amount"]], body: tableData, theme: "grid", }) // Totals const finalY = doc.lastAutoTable.finalY + 10 doc.text(`Total: ₹${invoice.total}`, 150, finalY) doc.text(`Output-CGST @ 9%: ₹${invoice.cgst}`, 150, finalY + 10) doc.text(`Output-SGST @ 9%: ₹${invoice.sgst}`, 150, finalY + 20) doc.setFont(undefined, "bold") doc.text(`Grand Total: ₹${invoice.grandTotal}`, 150, finalY + 30) // Amount in words doc.setFont(undefined, "normal") doc.text(`Amount Chargeable (in words): ${invoice.amountInWords}`, 20, finalY + 50) // Footer doc.text("Subject to the Tirupati Jurisdiction", 20, finalY + 70) doc.text("This is a Computer Generated Invoice", 150, finalY + 70) doc.text("Authorised Signatory", 20, finalY + 80) return doc } const generateBatchSlipPDF = (batchSlip) => { const doc = new jsPDF() // Header - Company Name (centered) doc.setFontSize(14) doc.setFont(undefined, "bold") doc.text("RR CONSTRUCTIONS", 105, 20, { align: "center" }) doc.setFontSize(9) doc.setFont(undefined, "normal") doc.text("MCI 70 Control System Ver 3.1", 105, 27, { align: "center" }) doc.text("SCHWING Stetter", 105, 32, { align: "center" }) // Title Section with border doc.setFontSize(10) doc.setFont(undefined, "bold") // Draw title box doc.rect(20, 40, 120, 8) doc.rect(140, 40, 50, 8) doc.text("Docket / Batch Report / Autographic Record", 25, 46) doc.text("Plant Serial", 145, 44) doc.text(`Number: ${batchSlip.plantSerialNumber}`, 145, 47) // Details Section - Two columns with borders let yPos = 55 // Left column details const leftDetails = [ ["Batch Date", batchSlip.batchDate || "2025-05-06"], ["Batch Start Time", batchSlip.batchStartTime || "08:00"], ["Batch End Time", batchSlip.batchEndTime || "08:30"], ["Batch Number / Docket Number", batchSlip.batchNumber || "1234"], ["Customer", batchSlip.customer || "Client A"], ["Site", batchSlip.site || "Client A"], ["Recipe Code", batchSlip.recipeCode || "M10"], ["Recipe Name", batchSlip.recipeName || "Default Recipe"], ["Truck Number", batchSlip.truckNumber || "tm123564"], ["Truck Driver", batchSlip.truckDriver || "murugesan"], ["Order Number", batchSlip.orderNumber || "1"], ["Batcher Name", batchSlip.batcherName || "ss"], ] // Right column details const rightDetails = [ ["Ordered Quantity", `${batchSlip.orderedQuantity || "10.00"} M³`], ["Production Quantity", `${batchSlip.productionQuantity || "10.00"} M³`], ["Adj/Manual Quantity", `${batchSlip.adjManualQuantity || "0.00"} M³`], ["With This Load", `${batchSlip.withThisLoad || "0.00"} M³`], ["Mixer Capacity", `${batchSlip.mixerCapacity || "0.50"} M³`], ["Batch Size", `${batchSlip.batchSize || "0.50"} M³`], ] doc.setFontSize(8) doc.setFont(undefined, "normal") // Draw left column leftDetails.forEach((detail, index) => { const y = yPos + index * 6 doc.rect(20, y, 60, 6) doc.rect(80, y, 60, 6) doc.text(detail[0] + " :", 22, y + 4) doc.text(detail[1], 82, y + 4) }) // Draw right column rightDetails.forEach((detail, index) => { const y = yPos + index * 6 doc.rect(140, y, 35, 6) doc.rect(175, y, 15, 6) doc.text(detail[0] + " :", 142, y + 4) doc.text(detail[1], 177, y + 4) }) // Material Table yPos = 130 // Table headers const headers = ["Batch Size in M³", "SAND", "40 MM", "0", "CEM-1", "CEM-2", "CEM-3", "WATER", "0 ADMIX1"] const colWidths = [25, 18, 18, 12, 18, 18, 18, 18, 23] let xPos = 20 doc.setFontSize(7) doc.setFont(undefined, "bold") // Draw header row headers.forEach((header, index) => { doc.rect(xPos, yPos, colWidths[index], 8) doc.text(header, xPos + 1, yPos + 5) xPos += colWidths[index] }) // Data rows (20 rows as shown in image) doc.setFont(undefined, "normal") for (let i = 0; i < 20; i++) { yPos += 8 xPos = 20 const rowData = ["145.00", "75.00", "150.00", "0.00", "25.00", "25.00", "25.00", "45.00", "0.38"] rowData.forEach((data, index) => { doc.rect(xPos, yPos, colWidths[index], 8) doc.text(data, xPos + 2, yPos + 5) xPos += colWidths[index] }) } // Total Set Weight row yPos += 8 xPos = 20 doc.setFont(undefined, "bold") const totalSetData = [ "Total Set Weight", "1500.00", "3000.00", "0.00", "500.00", "500.00", "500.00", "900.00", "7.50", ] totalSetData.forEach((data, index) => { doc.rect(xPos, yPos, colWidths[index], 8) doc.text(data, xPos + 1, yPos + 5) xPos += colWidths[index] }) // Add some spacing yPos += 15 // Total Actual row xPos = 20 const totalActualData = [ "Total Actual", "1500.00", "3000.00", "0.00", "500.00", "500.00", "500.00", "900.00", "7.50", ] totalActualData.forEach((data, index) => { doc.rect(xPos, yPos, colWidths[index], 8) doc.text(data, xPos + 1, yPos + 5) xPos += colWidths[index] }) // Footer - Batcher Name doc.setFont(undefined, "normal") doc.setFontSize(9) doc.text(`Batcher Name :`, 20, yPos + 20) doc.text(batchSlip.batcherName || "ss", 20, yPos + 25) return doc } // Invoice Actions const viewInvoice = (invoice) => { setModalContent(invoice) setModalType("invoice") setShowModal(true) } const downloadInvoice = (invoice) => { const doc = generateInvoicePDF(invoice) doc.save(`Invoice_${invoice.invoiceNumber}.pdf`) } const sendInvoice = (invoice) => { console.log("Sending invoice:", invoice) alert(`Invoice ${invoice.invoiceNumber} sent to ${invoice.clientEmail}`) } // Batch Slip Actions const viewBatchSlip = (batchSlip) => { setModalContent(batchSlip) setModalType("batchslip") setShowModal(true) } const downloadBatchSlip = (batchSlip) => { const doc = generateBatchSlipPDF(batchSlip) doc.save(`BatchSlip_${batchSlip.batchNumber}.pdf`) } const sendBatchSlip = (batchSlip) => { console.log("Sending batch slip:", batchSlip) alert(`Batch slip ${batchSlip.batchNumber} sent to ${batchSlip.clientEmail}`) } return (
🧾

Invoices & Batch Slips

{/* Invoice Details Table */}

Invoice Details

{batchSlips.map((invoice, index) => ( ))}
S.No Invoice Number Date Client Name Description Grand Total (₹) Actions
{index + 1} {invoice.invoiceNumber} {new Date(invoice.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()} {invoice.clientName} {invoice.description} ₹{invoice.grandTotal}
{batchSlips.length === 0 && (

No invoices found. Create a batch slip to generate invoices.

)}
{/* Batch Slip Details Table */}

Batch Slip Details

{batchSlips.map((batchSlip, index) => ( ))}
S.No Batch Number Batch Date Customer Recipe Code Quantity (M³) Client Mail Client Address Actions
{index + 1} {batchSlip.batchNumber} {batchSlip.batchDate} {batchSlip.customer} {batchSlip.recipeCode} {batchSlip.quantity} {batchSlip.clientEmail} {batchSlip.clientAddress}
{batchSlips.length === 0 && (

No batch slips found. Create a batch slip to see details here.

)}
{/* Modal for Invoice/Batch Slip View */} {showModal && modalContent && (
setShowModal(false)}>
e.stopPropagation()}>

{modalType === "invoice" ? "Invoice Preview" : "Batch Slip Preview"}

{modalType === "invoice" ? (
{/* Company Header */}

RR CONSTRUCTIONS

GSTIN: 33AAGFT4474P1Z1

Excel College Campus, NH 91, Mathura Road, Haryana - 121102

GST/NSN: 33AAGFT4474P1Z1

Biller: INFRA LP

State Name: Tamil Nadu, India

Tax Invoice

Invoice No: {modalContent.invoiceNumber}

Date: {new Date(modalContent.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}

Batch Number: {modalContent.batchNumber}

Terms of Delivery: As per Order & Cheque

{/* Bill To Section */}

Bill To:

{modalContent.clientName}

{modalContent.clientAddress}

GSTIN: {modalContent.clientGSTIN || "N/A"}

Dispatch Site:

N/A

Bill of Lading/Ref No: N/A

{/* Invoice Table */}
Description HSN Quantity Rate Per Amount
{modalContent.description} {modalContent.hsn} {modalContent.quantity} ₹{modalContent.rate} {modalContent.unit} ₹{modalContent.total}
Total ₹{modalContent.total}
Output-CGST @ 9% ₹{modalContent.cgst}
Output-SGST @ 9% ₹{modalContent.sgst}
Grand Total ₹{modalContent.grandTotal}
{/* Footer */}

Amount Chargeable (in words): {modalContent.amountInWords}

Subject to the Tirupati Jurisdiction

This is a Computer Generated Invoice

Authorised Signatory

) : (

RR CONSTRUCTIONS

MCI 70 Control System Ver 3.1

SCHWING Stetter

Docket / Batch Report / Autographic Record

Plant Serial Number: {modalContent.plantSerialNumber}
Batch Date: {modalContent.batchDate}
Batch Number: {modalContent.batchNumber}
Customer: {modalContent.customer}
Recipe Code: {modalContent.recipeCode}
Recipe Name: {modalContent.recipeName}
Truck Number: {modalContent.truckNumber}
Truck Driver: {modalContent.truckDriver}
Batcher Name: {modalContent.batcherName}
)}
)}
) } export default Invoices
